org.forgerock.openidm.external.rest

Class RestService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openidm.external.rest.RestService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.forgerock.json.resource.SingletonResourceProvider

    @Service
@Properties(value={@Property(name="service.vendor",value="ForgeRock AS."),@Property(name="service.description",value="ForgeRock AS"),@Property(name="openidm.router.prefix",value="/external/rest")})
public class RestService
extends Object
implements org.forgerock.json.resource.SingletonResourceProvider
    External REST connectivity
